meanings.definition: A map in which some thematic mapping variable is substituted for land area or distance.
meanings.sent1: The cartograms displayed population density in a visually striking way.
meanings.sent2: I used cartograms to compare the sizes of different countries.
meanings.sent3: The cartograms at the exhibit made me realize how diverse our world is.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of cartograms, each representing a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The cartograms of the election results made the data easy to understand.

meanings.definition: A diagrammatic presentation in tabular form.
meanings.sent1: The cartograms in the report helped illustrate the data clearly.
meanings.sent2: I created cartograms to organize the information for my presentation.
meanings.sent3: The cartograms on the wall looked like a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like cartograms, neatly arranged and easy to follow.
meanings.sent5: The cartograms on the screen made the statistics more engaging.
